name: padalayai-monorepo
description: PadalayAI - AI-powered document analysis platform with MCP servers

scripts.build:mcp: npm run build --workspace=mcp/blogger-server && npm run build --workspace=mcp/facebook-server && npm run build --workspace=mcp/instagram-server
scripts.dev:all: concurrently "npm run start:chromadb" "npm run dev:backend" "npm run dev:frontend" "npm run dev:blogger" "npm run dev:facebook" "npm run dev:instagram"
scripts.dev:full: concurrently "npm run start:chromadb" "npm run dev:backend" "npm run dev:frontend" "npm run dev:blogger" "npm run dev:facebook" "npm run dev:instagram"
scripts.dev:core: concurrently "npm run start:chromadb" "npm run dev:backend" "npm run dev:frontend"
scripts.start:all: concurrently "npm run start:chromadb" "npm run start:backend" "npm run start:frontend"

author: PadalayAI
